title: Study Guide
subtitle: Master Effective Learning Methods and Practical Techniques

principles.title: Understanding Over Memorization
principles.description: Focus on understanding principles and logic rather than memorizing terms
practices: Draw diagrams to explain complex systems

principles.title: Practice Validates Theory
principles.description: Deepen theoretical understanding through hands-on experience

principles.title: Multi-Dimensional Exploration
principles.description: Understand the same concept from different angles

principles.title: Critical Thinking
principles.description: Maintain independent thinking, question and verify

steps.content: Learn cryptography basics, hash functions, digital signatures
Understand blockchain structure, consensus mechanisms, P2P networks
Study source code, BIP proposals, layer-2 protocols
Run nodes, develop applications, contribute to projects
Scarcity, deflationary model, store of value
Market analysis, risk management, investment strategies
Trust mechanisms, power structures, governance models
Legal frameworks, regulatory policies, international impacts
Case studies, policy analysis, future outlook

methods.name: Deep Research Method
methods.description: Choose core topics for in-depth exploration
process: Select a core concept (e.g., 'Proof of Work')
Collect authoritative materials and different viewpoints
Understand technical principles and design philosophy
methods.example: Deep dive into Bitcoin's consensus mechanism, understand why PoW was chosen over other options

methods.name: Comparative Analysis
process: Select comparison objects (e.g., Bitcoin vs Traditional Banks)
List characteristics and mechanisms of each
methods.example: Compare the essential differences between Bitcoin and Central Bank Digital Currencies (CBDCs)

methods.name: Problem-Driven Learning
methods.description: Learn with specific questions in mind
methods.example: 'How does Bitcoin prevent double-spending?' leads to learning about UTXO model and confirmation mechanisms

exercises.title: Create Wallet
exercises.description: Download wallet software, generate address, understand public/private keys
exercises.learning: Understand asymmetric encryption and address generation

exercises.title: Testnet Transaction
exercises.description: Get coins on testnet and send transactions
exercises.learning: Understand transaction flow and fee mechanisms

exercises.title: Block Exploration
exercises.description: Use block explorer to analyze transactions and blocks
exercises.learning: Understand block structure and transaction confirmation

exercises.title: Run Node
exercises.description: Set up and run a full node
exercises.learning: Understand P2P network and data validation

exercises.title: Lightning Network
exercises.description: Open lightning channels, make instant payments

exercises.title: Multi-Sig Wallet
exercises.learning: Understand multi-sig mechanisms and security strategies

exercises.title: Script Programming
exercises.learning: Deep understanding of transaction validation logic

exercises.title: Protocol Development
exercises.description: Study BIP proposals, participate in improvements

summary.content: Learning Bitcoin is an ongoing process that requires patience and persistence. Choose a path that suits you, apply the right methods, deepen understanding through practice, engage with the community, and you will gradually build a deep understanding of Bitcoin.
